Base:InitialProperties.Base:InitialProperty: "THE ART OF HAIRSTYLING: A Hand-Book For Hairstylists"

"THE ART OF HAIRSTYLING\
\
\\"Fair tresses man’s imperial race insnare,\
And beauty draws us with a single hair.\\"\
\
A Hand-Book for Hairstylists\
CONTENTS\
\
2. Introduction\
3. Color \& Length\
4. Style \& Type\
5. Proficiency\
6. Novice\
7. Junior Apprentice\
8. Senior Apprentice\
9. Fellowcraft\
10. Journeyman\
11. Artisan\
12. Senior Artisan\
13. Master\
14. Master Adept\
15. Grand Master\
16. Updates"

"INTRODUCTION\
\
Even cats and hairy beasts arrange their fur, and the turgid porpentine keeps his tresses ordered. Thus the hairstylist's craft predates even civilization, speech and thought itself. The hairstylists of the castle possess the special skills to change the style, length, color and even type of their patron's hair. Only those whose natural hirsuteness is coequal with that of the cannon-ball or the slick boulder are immune to the hairstylist's craft."

"COLOR \& LENGTH\
\
A hairstylist can dye the hair of a guest to another color; however, they should be aware that only advanced students of this ancient craft can undo the effects of a poor hair color choice. Similarly, while the length of a person's hair may be altered with a stylist's scissors, only a Master can make future alterations, or restore the hair to a point where lesser stylists might work upon it again."

"STYLE \& TYPE\
\
The style and type of hair upon a person's head can similarly be modified by a hairstylist. Again, care must be taken, as the effects of a poor choice may be quite obvious to all for some time."

"PROFICIENCY\
\
Ten levels of proficiency are recognized for the hairstyling skill:\
\
1. Novice\
2. Junior Apprentice\
3. Senior Apprentice\
4. Fellowcraft\
5. Journeyman\
6. Artisan\
7. Senior Artisan\
8. Master\
9. Master Adept\
10. Grand Master\
\
The remainder of this Hand-Book describe the Color, Length, Style and Type options available to hairstylists at each level of proficiency."

"NOVICE\
\
Novices are the least experienced hairstylists. Their styling skills are admittedly rather limited and pedestrian.\
\
They can give hair the unpopular colors of black or dark-brown.\
\
Their scissors result in hair with a length of butchered or lopsided.\
\
The styles they employ are uncombed, mussed or tangled -- hardly desireable.\
\
Hair of type coarse, snarled or greasy can be produced by their efforts."

"JUNIOR APPRENTICE\
\
Junior Apprentices know a bit more than Novices, but their additional skills can hardly be called impressive.\
\
They can dye hair with the colors sable, or mouse-brown.\
\
They know how to produce hair with the length \\"shaved.\\"\
\
A few basic styles, such as windblown, combed, or crew-cut can be employed by these stylists.\
\
They can change the type of hair to kinky, unruly, or stringy."

"SENIOR APPRENTICE\
\
Senior Apprentices have attained sufficient skill to attempt a handful of modest but useful styles.\
\
They can dye hair sandy or light-brown.\
\
They can cut hair to be close-cropped.\
\
They can create the styles known as flat-top, combed-back, or bun.\
\
They can change the type of a person's hair to frizzy, wiry, or bristly."

"FELLOWCRAFT\
\
Fellowcraft hairstylists have spent many hours learning their trade.\
\
They know the secrets of producing chestnut or straw-colored hair.\
\
They can alter the length of a person's hair to short.\
\
Their skills include the styles of bowl-cut, pigtail, and the ponytail.\
\
Hair in their care can be bushy, thick, or ample."

"JOURNEYMAN\
\
Journeymen possess the confidence to work with styling options of particular grace and appeal.\
\
Dyes for changing hair to flaxen, raven, or reddish-blond are known by them.\
\
They can cut hair to appear trimmed.\
\
Among the styles they know are braided, worn-up, and the top-knot.\
\
They can produce hair that is wavy, soft, or shiny."

"ARTISAN\
\
Artisans have proven themselves capable of the fine control needed to handle some of the more challenging hairstyles and dyes.\
\
These craftsmen know methods of producing blond, grey, or blue-black hair color.\
\
They can cut hair to have long length.\
\
Styles they employ include two-braids, french-braid, and the pageboy.\
\
A person's hair in their care can be made curly, fine, or bouncy."

"SENIOR ARTISAN\
\
Senior Artisans are sought by those desiring an unusual coiffure. They often serve as assistants to Master hairstylists.\
\
They can produce hair which is red, honey-blond, or salt-and-pepper in color.\
\
They know secret methods of producing shoulder-length hair.\
\
The popular styles of plaited, layered, and coiled can be produced by their skills.\
\
Hair types of lush, flouncy, or lively are theirs to produce."

"MASTER\
\
Masters are the virtuosi of the hairstylist's art. Their long career of study and practice has earned them the ability to work with designs of the most exotic quality. They can also alter the color, length, style and texture of hair which has already been styled.\
\
They can give hair the colors of silver, auburn, or golden-blond.\
\
Their skill with scissors can produce waist-length hair.\
\
The styles they command include ringlets, shingled, and the beehive.\
\
They know methods of producing three additional hair types: silky, downy, and wispy."

"MASTER ADEPT\
\
Master Adepts are normally the most skilled and popular hairstylists within the castle, capable of splendid styling options.\
\
They can dye hair to be white or platinum-blond.\
\
Their art includes knowledge of how to create knee-length hair.\
\
They can give a person a pompadour or chignon.\
\
Hair which they work upon can be made luxuriant."

"GRAND MASTER\
\
Many seasons pass between the appearances of Grand Master hairstylists within the castle. Their amazing skills are usually reserved for Her Majesty the Queen, and the luckier members of Her Court.\
\
These mysterious artists know the secret method of producing snow-white hair.\
\
Their near-magical skill can give a person floor-length hair.\
\
The amazing cascade style is a sign of their timeless skill.\
\
They can give hair a fabulous quality -- iridescent."

"UPDATES\
\
As fashions change and new methods are discovered, more styles, colors and hair types can be produced by the hairstylists of the Castle. The text of this book will mysteriously update itself as new choices become available. More experienced stylists will inform you if and when updates occur.\
\
Please bring typographical errors or other textual problems found in this volume to the attention of the staff."
